name: Pokemon Z
description:
Pokemon Z is an adventure-RPG game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Pokemon Z is available on Android and PC.
It was produced by Hitoshi Yamagami, Junichi Masuda, Shusaku Egami and Takato Utsunomiya. Junichi Masuda directed the game. It was scored by Hitomi Sato, Junichi Masuda, Minako Adachi and Shota Kageyama.
